desc: Generate simple or strong passwords and copy them to clipboard
name: PasswordGenerator

desc: Generates a random password and copies it to the clipboard
name: copyPassword

desc: Generates a random password and copies it to the clipboard. This method can use special characters: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789!\\#$%&()*+-./<=>?@[]^_{|}~ Excludes similar characters like O and 0 or ' and " or ` and ´ or : and ; and ,
name: strongPassword

desc: Generates a random password and copies it to the clipboard. This method uses only alphanumeric characters: ABCDEFGHIJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789 Excludes similar characters like O and 0 or ' and " or ` and ´ or : and ; and ,
name: weakPassword
